subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Backup goalie Kevin Weekes stopped 29 shots in his second victory in two nights, and the Rangers finished a successful trip out West with a 3-1 victory over the San Jose Sharks on Thursday night.
snippet: Backup goalie Kevin Weekes stopped 29 shots in his second victory in two nights, and the Rangers finished a successful trip out West with a 3-1 victory over the San Jose Sharks on Thursday night.
